dublinCore.dc:title: 114 SJ 20 PCS: Relating to the approval of the proposed Agreement for Cooperation Between the United States of America and the Government of the Republic of Korea Concerning Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cardin (by request) introduced the following joint resolution; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations
Committee discharged pursuant to 42 U.S.C. 2159(i) and Section 601(b)(4) of Public Law 94–329, and placed on the calendar

form.official-title: Relating to the approval of the proposed Agreement for Cooperation Between the United States of America and the Government of the Republic of Korea Concerning Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy.

section.text: That the Congress does favor the proposed agreement for cooperation transmitted to the Congress by the President on June 16, 2015.

endorsement.action-desc: Committee discharged pursuant to 42 U.S.C. 2159(i) and Section 601(b)(4) of Public Law 94–329, and placed on the calendar
